p: Where, Y is the resilience index (dependent variable); a is the intercept; bs and Xs are the coefficients and the set of predictors, respectively [ 43]. Thirty-four explanatory variables were included in the regression model; of which 27 indicators statistically predicted the resilience ( S6 Table). The bivariate correlations of variables were presented in the supportive information section ( S2â€“ S5 Tables).
